channel.title: Making a server!
channel.description: hi i need some help with making my server and im not a noob ive got jdk ive got source of revolution got client but i tried connecting with different computer using silabs nd it says error but on my own comp it lets me in and its ip is 0.0.0.0 for some reason so no one can get on please help

item.title: Making a server!
item.dc:creator: @RS_IS_DED RS IS DED
item.description:
@RS_IS_DED wrote:

Thatâ€™s your localhost IP meaning only you can log onto it. You must make an IP then portfoward it, then you and others can play. I suggest going over how to make a server, guide again.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 26, 2008, 01:24:22 am[/size][hr]And wrong section, this was supposed to go in help.
